column2: Our National Defence must be very strong to deter and foil any unfriendly nations.
Establish strong repository of arms and ammunition.
Establish strong line of defence by investing in more jobs for putting person with faith in defending the nation.
We favour investment in stock and commodity exchanges.
We believe in strength of gold and holing gold as one of the assets of the nation.
We believe that best defended of the nation is to have aggressive foreign policy.
War is also a means to defend the nation at the same time strengthen the economy of your country.
Taking War to other nation is best policy than to have to defend one from unfriendly nations.
